# PKEraserTool.EraserType.bitmap

**Case**

An eraser that removes only those portions of the drawing it touches.

## Declaration

```swift
case bitmap
```

## Eraser types

- **PKEraserTool.EraserType.vector**: An eraser that removes an entire drawn line.
- **PKEraserTool.EraserType.fixedWidthBitmap**
